title: Portuguese - Personalized Learning Test
description: Test personalized questions and learning from mistakes
grammar: This lesson tests dynamic user name integration and improved learning flow for incorrect answers.

items.explanation: In Portuguese, 'meu nome é' means 'my name is'. This answer adapts to your actual name!
Olá (hello) + eu sou (I am) + your name. Notice how the system uses your actual name!
'Gostar de' means 'to like' - always use 'de' after gostar. The preposition is mandatory!
SER (é) for permanent characteristics like color. A casa É azul (permanent state).
'De onde você é?' asks about origin/nationality. 'De onde' = from where.
